title: Odohu
author: Odohu
content: My fellow country people, make una follow me reason this tory wey I carry come maybe one or two person fit learn how to be safe as a Nigerian. One day you come outside make you for feed your eyes small for wetin street dey talk, you come see say two people dey pursue one guy man say him na thief. True true the guy na thief and na expensive item him steal for one store. As him dey run, luck no too follow am, so them come catch am and na so him start to beg. You dey one corner dey observe as them start to beat am, the guy dey beg but them no gree. You come start to dey go closer make you for observe everything better and see weda na person wey you know and if you fit put mouth beg too; other people too don dey face that side as e dey be na when people hear noise. But as you don dey near there, one of the people wey catch am wey happen to be the owner of the shop come carry something hit the thief, na so the thief voice loss... him no dey move or talk again! By this time, you don dey very close to them when you observe say them don knack the thief something wey strong wey fit mean say the guy don kpeme, but you never confirm sha o. Immediately, you come match break, come reverse and begin to discharge for the area, as a Nigeria make wetin you no know no put you for wahala. If e  happen say true true the guy die and camera dey somewhere wey capture everything and all the people wey dey near the area as e happen... and e come be say you comot for the area run go your house, base on Nigeria system, you dey free or you no dey free? If the person no dey free, wetin be the right thing wey the person suppose do? Remember o, them never confirm say the person don die... you just observe as they knack am and as him no dey move or talk again, and you take off immediately.
